name: The Scrapbots of Planet Junk
description:
Traverse Planet Junk and destroy enemy robots with your arsenal of unorthodox weapons. Harvest parts from fallen foes and avoid becoming scrap yourself. Defeat the Goliath and escape to the stars.

Controls:

WASD - Movement Keys

Space - Jump

LMB - Fire

RMB - Punch

E - Interact

1 2 3 4 - Weapon Swap
